Package nessusTools.run

Class Job.Accessor

java.lang.Object
nessusTools.run.Job.Accessor
Enclosing class:
Job
public final class Job.Accessor
extends java.lang.Object
The "accessor" allows for quasi-public access to private methods of Job, which should only be accessible to the main thread and to worker threads as necessary. By restricting access to the job's accessor, we can control who has access to these methods, making them effectively private for all but select classes.
